title: Our Worst Fears Have Come True in Myanmar
description: But the country’s people have come too far to give up their freedom.
dc:creator: Nilar Thein
category: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat

media:description: U Kyaw Min Yu, his wife, Daw Nilar Thein, and their daughter after the couple’s release from prison in Yangon, Myanmar, in January 2012.
